price: ‹ ߡߏ߬ߛߏ › ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߤߍ߲߬ ߊߟߎ߬ ߞߏߟߊߕߍ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߸ ߗߋߛߓߍ߫ ߞߟߊߒߞߋ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߓߘߊ߫ ߟߊߝߟߌ߬ ߒ ߞߊ߲߬ ߣߌ߲߬
arabic: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ إِنِّيٓ أُلۡقِيَ إِلَيَّ كِتَٰبٞ كَرِيمٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u innī ul'qiya ilayya kitābun karīmun
